TopicTitle: How to do a Surface Outpost contract?

Articles.Content: I just want to know how to make a surface outpost for the contracts. Do the pieces have to be docked, or just near each other? The contract description never really covered that, and I never wanted to waste the funds trying to find out. Thanks for any help!
All the pieces need to be connected. They can be on wheels, landing gear, or directly on the surface, just so long as they are landed!
